statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_records;
SELECT patient_id, record_data FROM healthcare_records WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_records GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT patient_id, record_data FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_data->>'diagnosis' AS diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_data->>'symptoms' ILIKE '%fever%'
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM(SELECT MAX(timestamp) - MIN(timestamp) FROM healthcare_records))) AS average_time_span
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_details WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_details;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_details WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_name, blood_type FROM healthcare_records JOIN patient_details ON healthcare_records.patient_id = patient_details.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM patient_details WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM healthcare_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_data FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 'a1b2c3' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, record_data FROM doctor_records WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT record_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_id > 100 ORDER BY block_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-02';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = '4b737440-5ce6-4a86-9f1a-a76044f49a42';
SELECT record_id, record_data, timestamp FROM doctor_records WHERE doctor_id = '5e3df7f1-b15b-4324-bf47-2331b52feb7d' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_hash LIKE 'abc%' AND previous_block_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM patient_records;
SELECT block_id, record_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_id < 100 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, timestamp FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' LIMIT 3;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM medical_facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT integration_id, blockchain_address FROM blockchain_integration;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_facilities WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT doctor_name, facility_name FROM doctors JOIN medical_facilities ON doctors.doctor_id = medical_facilities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, medication_type FROM Medications WHERE medication_type='Tablet' ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, gender, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND blood_type = 'O-';
SELECT appointment_date, completed FROM Appointments WHERE completed = false ORDER BY appointment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_name, medication_description FROM Medications WHERE medication_type = 'Antibiotic' ORDER BY medication_name ASC LIMIT 5;
